relevance_explanation: All steps irrelevant to the customer have been removed. This includes pruning the logic for customers with less than 30,000 loyalty points and the logic branch for issuing travel credit.
completeness_explanation: All necessary steps and tool calls for this customer have been preserved. The routine includes the preferred client welcome, booking details retrieval, cancellation blocker check, fee calculation, flight cancellation, refund processing, confirmation, and case completion.
